apps.name: SpotC++
apps.changelog:
- Added Sposify Fix 0.0.6, which should fix it from crashing when opening settings.
 - Fixed Update loop when using SideStore or AltStore.

 More Info:
 https://github.com/SpotCompiled/SpotC-Plus-Plus/releases/tag/v1.1.3

apps.localizedDescription:
Spotilife is a Spotify IOS app tweak that removes ads, removes limited skips, and almost every other premium feature. The only main premium feature that does not work is offline downloads, as this is done server-side.

 Sposify is a Spotify IOS app tweak that adds various enhancements to the Spotify IOS application.

 More Info:
 https://github.com/SpotCompiled/SpotC-Plus-Plus

 We are not affiliated, associated, authorized, endorsed by, or in any way officially connected with any other company, agency or government agency. All product and company names are trademarks™ or registered® trademarks of their respective holders. Use of them does not imply any affiliation with or endorsement by them.

privacy.name: camera
privacy.usageDescription: This lets you scan Spotify Codes.

privacy.name: photos
privacy.usageDescription: This lets you save and select images to and from your Photo Library.

privacy.name: music
privacy.usageDescription: This will let you play your imported music on Spotify.

privacy.name: motion
privacy.usageDescription: Used to control your tempo for Spotify Running.

privacy.name: microphone
privacy.usageDescription: This lets you control Spotify using your voice.

privacy.name: bluetooth
privacy.usageDescription: This lets you use Spotify with external accessories.

privacy.name: network
privacy.usageDescription: This lets you listen on different devices. Spotify will also get access to local audio files.

privacy.name: faceid
privacy.usageDescription: This lets you set access restrictions using Face ID.

Used to control your tempo for Spotify Running.
This lets you control Spotify using your voice.
This lets you use Spotify with external accessories.
This lets you listen on different devices. Spotify will also get access to local audio files.
This lets you set access restrictions using Face ID.
